directions.step:
From: jfwhome!babs@eddie.mit.edu
Date: 21 Nov 1993 10:11:46 -0500
From: karen@madhouse.cavebbs.gen.nz (SYSTEM 0PERATOR)
Date: 3 Dec 91 11:43:11 GMT
Mix together flour, sugar, coconut and rolled oats. Melt butter and golden syrup. Dissolve bicarb soda in the boiling water and add to butter and golden syrup. Make a well in the centre of the flour, stir in the liquid. Place in spoonfuls on greased trays. Bake 15-20 minutes at 180 deg C (350 deg F).
